title: Taking Shelter of Lordâ€™s Lotus Feet | Sri Stoka Krishna Maharaj | SB 6.9.22 | 25.07.2024
speaker: HH Stoka Krishna Maharaj

segments.key_quote: That supreme personality of godhead is the only shelter of everyone.
segments.summary: The Lord is the only shelter, and seeking protection elsewhere is foolish, like holding a dog's tail to cross the ocean.

segments.key_quote: The Lord's lotus feet are an indestructible boat. Anyone takes shelter of that boat, he can easily cross the ocean of nisscience.
segments.summary: Taking shelter of the Lord's lotus feet is the only way to cross the ocean of nescience, ensuring safety for devotees even in the dangerous material world.

segments.key_quote: Among the topmost sinful action is killing a Brahmana.
segments.summary: The story of Indra offending his spiritual master, taking Vishwaroopa as a priest, Vishwaroopa secretly offering oblations to demons, and Indra killing him, incurring the sin of Brahma Hatya.

segments.key_quote: Some mistake in the chanting, the meaning can be completely opposite.
segments.summary: Vishwaroopa's father, Tvashta, performs a sacrifice to create someone to kill Indra, but a mistake in chanting the mantra empowers Indra instead, leading to the birth of the demon Vritrasura.

segments.key_quote: Free from all material conceptions of existence.
segments.summary: The demigods glorify the Lord as free from material conceptions, contrasting Vaishnava and Mayavadi interpretations of scriptures regarding the Lord's qualities.

segments.key_quote: Material existence begins when the living entity is bewildered by the contact with material energy, by being placed in the material energy.
segments.summary: Material existence causes bewilderment and illusion, leading to a distorted perception of reality, unlike the unbewildered state of the Lord and the pure spirit soul in spiritual existence.

segments.key_quote: He is spiritually perfect and he is fully satisfied within himself.
segments.summary: The Lord is always fully satisfied, while living entities in material existence constantly seek satisfaction and happiness, which can only be found through devotional service.

segments.key_quote: In devotional service one becomes completely happy and satisfied.
segments.summary: Devotional service leads to complete happiness and satisfaction, as the Lord is fully satisfied with his own spiritual perfection, while conditioned souls are subject to external influences.

segments.key_quote: They are always perfect in their behavior, in their character, they are unaffected by any materialistic activity.
segments.summary: Material existence is characterized by the influence of the three gunas, while devotional service elevates one to the spiritual platform, where pure devotees remain unaffected by material conditions.

segments.key_quote: Supreme Personality of God is the only shelter of everyone.
segments.summary: The Supreme Personality of Godhead is the only shelter for everyone, as described by Sridhar Swami, with Krishna being the ultimate source and shelter of all surrendered souls.

segments.key_quote: Krishna is called Ashraya Tattva. Means He is the only one who can give protection, who can give shelter. Nobody else can give shelter to anybody else.
segments.summary: Everything rests under Krishna's lotus feet, making Him the only true shelter (Ashraya Tattva), while seeking protection from demigods is foolish.

segments.key_quote: One should seek shelter only of the Supreme Lord.
segments.summary: Seeking shelter from demigods is like trying to cross the ocean by holding a dog's tail, only the Supreme Lord can save us from all dangers.

segments.key_quote: If we are drowning in the middle of an ocean, then by ourselves we cannot cross the ocean, neither by help of anybody else other than the Supreme Lord can we cross the ocean.
segments.summary: Taking shelter of the Lord's lotus feet is like boarding an indestructible boat that shrinks the ocean of material existence, allowing devotees to easily cross over to the spiritual world.

segments.key_quote: There is danger in every step.
segments.summary: The material world is characterized by constant danger and suffering caused by the three modes of nature, symbolized by Durga Devi's trident.

segments.key_quote: Under the influence of illusion sometimes the living entity thinks some misery to be actually enjoyment.
segments.summary: Living entities in the material world are constantly suffering from miseries, but under the influence of illusion, they sometimes mistake misery for enjoyment.

segments.key_quote: Death itself is hanging like a sword on our neck.
segments.summary: The fear of death is always present, and relief from misery is often misinterpreted as happiness, while the factual position in material existence is constant unhappiness and distress.

segments.key_quote: It is only the spiritual world which is suitable for us.
segments.summary: The material world is not the right atmosphere for the spirit soul, and only devotional service can transfer us to our original position of eternal happiness in the spiritual world.
